Text: High point: Page 6, mentions "The Prisoner". Low: 16yo girl who drinks vodka don't get gangraped on page 10.

Thanks Grakh. We appreciate your careful reading of the work, except for the fact that Sam didn't say the girl who drinks vodka is as old as 16. Sam told me that the example he gave was more likely of a 13 year old girl if that makes things clearer for you.
